name: Sayote Tops Bellpepper Steamed Scrambled Egg
description: This delightful Sayote Tops Bellpepper Steamed Scrambled Egg recipe is perfect for those following a low-carb and low-sugar diet. Full of fresh flavors and healthy ingredients, it's an ideal addition to your collection of healthy recipes.

recipeInstructions.text: Chop the steamed sayote tops and red bell pepper into small pieces. Mince the parsley finely.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Crack the eggs into a bowl, season with salt and ground pepper, and beat them until well mixed.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Add the chopped sayote tops, bell pepper, and minced parsley to the egg mixture and stir to combine.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat and pour the egg mixture into the pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Cook for about 5-7 minutes, gently stirring occasionally, until the eggs are fully cooked but still soft and creamy.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5
